key_talking_points: Sam Bennett scores early in the first period, assisted by Nick Schmidt and Eetu Rodrigues. The Panthers extend their lead to 5-4 against the Oilers.
The goal was scored at 2:07 of the first period on Stuart Skinner. Bennett's 13th of the season.
The Panthers have maintained relentless offensive pressure, with 42 shots on goal compared to the Oilers' 46.
for_commentary_agent.context: A goal was scored early in the period. The momentum is high, and the game is close, so immediate coverage is necessary.

game_context.game_situation: Away team leading by one goal

high_intensity_events.summary: Goal scored by S. Bennett (away) assisted by N. Schmidt (away) and E. Rodrigues (away)

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Panthers' offensive pressure and how the Oilers will respond to this early goal. Replay the goal and highlight the key passes.
